item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:
Mickey's Restaurant & Bar

ON THE PATIO! Perhaps it will still feel like the weekend if we are outside?


http://www.mickeysgro...

Join us for our first happy hour at Mickey's, which got a great review in the Hartford Courant which concluded, "No matter the weather or the threat of an impending Nor'easter, they absolutely should: This more-than-just-a-good-neighborhood joint is a flawless winner, across the board." Though it's in Hamden, it's just a short trip up Whitney Avenue, and I hope you'll all like it.

We will be in the lounge area. I hope we can go again in the summer to take advantage of their patio.

SPECIALS:
They are extending their happy hour until 7:30 or 8 pm for the NHC
$5.00/glass for 5 kinds of wine
$2.50 bud/bud light
$2.00 appetizers--the manager said they are big--include stuffed potato skins, etc

Contact:
Karen 203-535-8751
item.name: Monday Happy Hour 4/23 at Mickey's
